title: Did Joni Mitchell perform at Woodstock? - Quora

response.answer_text: No she did not attend and did not get stuck in traffic either, her manager had scheduled her for an interview on the very popular talk show ‘The Dick Cavett Show’ which was right after the Woodstock festival and wanted her ‘fresh’. Ironically two festival attendees and close friends joined her on the show Stephen Stills and David Crosby. She did however write the most famous song about the festival. “ Here she is explaining the song and her concert absence. Joni Mitchell - Woodstock (Live In-Studio 1970)
She did not!! Even though she undisputedly was the artist who most accurately embodied (among other things) the hippie spirit of the time. Joni Mitchell WAS Woodstock!
No, she missed it due to a traffic jam. She says she feels sorry for missing the greatest gig of her generation.
